summary: Two save games, male and female and you have access to the amulet of Mara and the option for marriage right from the beginning of a playthrough.
descriptionHtml:
You've virtually nothing to your name but the amulet of Mara. Its up to you to find a potential spouse and settle down to make a family. And maybe get around to that Dragon thing...maybe...


Included are two save games for a male and a female option. The male is an old man named Gilbert and the woman is Sandy, both Nords. But if you don't care for them just use the racemenu to change it.

Simple save game for people who don't want to run all the way to Riften just to grab the amulet.
author: Koji Okida
